REUTERS.UNKNOWN: A RM f0459 reute r f BC-DIAMOND-SHAMROCK-<DIA 04-17 0090

TEXT.TITLE: DIAMOND SHAMROCK <DIA> TO REDEEM DEBENTURES
TEXT.BODY: Diamond Shamrock Corp said it will redeem May 29 the entire outstanding amounts of three separate sinking fund debenture issues. The company will buy back its outstanding 79.7 mln dlrs of 7.70 pct debentures of 2001 at 103.20 pct of par value plus accrued interest, 59.9 mln dlrs of nine pct debentures due 1999 at 103.15 pct per principal amount plus accrued interest, and 50 mln dlrs of 9-1/8 pct debentures of 2000 at 103.625 pct of par value plus accrued interest. Reuter
